verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālal-mala'u min qaumihil-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū biliqā'il-ākhirati wa atrafnāhum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, mā hāżā illā basyarum miṡlukum, ya'kulu mimmā ta'kulūna minhu wa yasyrabu mimmā tasyrabūn(a).
verses.translation: Но молвили вожди его народа Из тех, кто не уверовал (в Аллаха), Считая ложью встречу дальней жизни (В День Воскресения на Суд), - (Из тех), кому Мы дали насладиться ближней жизнью: "Это - всего лишь человек, подобный вам, И ест он то, что вы едите, И пьет он то, что пьете вы

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْت<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9205'>ُم ب</tajweed>َشَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9206'>رًا م</tajweed>ِّثْلَكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4868'>ذًا ل</tajweed>َّخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>سِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa la'in aṭa'tum basyaram miṡlakum innakum iżal lakhāsirūn(a).
verses.translation: Ведь если покоритесь человеку вам сродни, Поистине, вы будете в убытке

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':151'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تُرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9207'>بًا و</tajweed>َعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9208'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّخْرَج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Aya'idukum annakum iżā mittum wa kuntum turābaw wa 'iẓāman annakum mukhrajūn(a).
verses.translation: Неужто он вам обещает, Что вас, когда умрете вы И станете костьми и прахом, Вновь к жизни возвратят

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Haihāta haihāta limā tū'adūn(a).
verses.translation: Как далеко (от Истины) все то, Что он вам обещает

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3995'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3996'>بْ</tajweed>عُوث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: In hiya illā ḥayātunad-dun-yā namūtu wa naḥyā wa mā naḥnu bimab'ūṡīn(a).
verses.translation: Нет ничего, помимо жизни в этом мире, - Мы умираем и живем. (Единожды умерши), не будем мы воскрешены

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9209'>ٱ</tajweed>فْتَرَىٰ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':412'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ كَذِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9210'>بًا و</tajweed>َمَا نَحْنُ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: In huwa illā rajuluniftarā 'alallāhi każibaw wa mā naḥnu lahū bimu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: Это - всего лишь человек, Кто ложь измыслил на Аллаха, Не верим мы ему

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ رَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9187'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9188'>نص</tajweed>ُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla rabbinṣurnī bimā każżabūn(i).
verses.translation: (Пророк) сказал: "О мой Господь! Пошли мне помощь защититься от того, Что (все они) меня лжецом считают

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا قَلِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9211'>لٍ ل</tajweed>َّيُصْبِحُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla 'ammā qalīlil layuṣbiḥunna nādimīn(a).
verses.translation: (Господь) сказал: "Пройдет короткое мгновенье, И раскаются они

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7288'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّيْحَةُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ غُث<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9212'>ءً‌ۚ ف</tajweed>َبُعْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9213'>دًا ل</tajweed>ِّلْقَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6165'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣaiḥatu bil-ḥaqqi fa ja'alahum guṡā'ā(n), fa bu'dal lil-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
verses.translation: И тут, поистине, их поразил зловещий вопль По справедливости (Господней), И Мы их сделали сухим жнивьем, Рассеянным в потоке (ветра), - Пусть сгинет нечестивый люд

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9202'>نش</tajweed>َأْنَا م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':1453'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma ansya'nā mim ba'dihim qurūnan ākharīn(a).
verses.translation: Потом Мы вырастили после них другие поколенья

verses.text_uthmani: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَــْٔخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta'khirūn(a).
verses.translation: Не может ни один народ Ни подогнать, ни задержать свой срок, (Назначенный Аллахом)

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا‌ۖ كُلَّ مَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9214'>ةً ر</tajweed>َّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ‌ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9215'>ُم ب</tajweed>َعْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9216'>ضًا و</tajweed>َجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ أَحَادِيثَ‌ۚ فَبُعْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9217'>دًا ل</tajweed>ِّقَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9218'>مٍ ل</tajweed>َّا يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma arsalnā rusulanā tatrā, kullamā jā'a ummatar rasūluhā każżabūhu fa atba'nā ba'ḍahum ba'ḍaw wa ja'alnāhum aḥādīṡ(a), fa bu'dal liqaumil lā yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: Потом посланников Мы слали друг за другом, Но всякий раз, когда посланник приходил к народу, Они его лжецом считали. Мы (в наказание за это) Один народ другим сменяли, (в небытие их повергая). И делали (истории их жизни) Как притчи (в назидание другим). Пусть сгинет люд, что не уверовал (в Аллаха)

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا وَسُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6479'>نٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma arsalnā mūsā wa akhāhu hārūn(a), bi'āyātinā wa sulṭānim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Потом отправили Мы Мусу и Харуна, его брата, С знаменьями от Нас и явной властью

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>يْ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4956'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَكْبَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَوْمًا عَال<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ilā fir'auna wa mala'ihī fastakbarū wa kānū qauman 'ālīn(a).
verses.translation: К Фараону и его вельможам. Они же преисполнились гордыни - То был народ высокомерный

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَقَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa qālū anu'minu libasyaraini miṡlinā wa qaumuhumā lanā 'ābidūn(a).
verses.translation: И сказали: "Ужель поверим двум таким же людям, как и мы, Тогда как нам подвластен их народ

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9219'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُهْلَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa każżabūhumā fa kānū minal-muhlakīn(a).
verses.translation: Они во лжи их обвинили И тем в число погубленных (людей) вошли

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':257'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba la'allahum yahtadūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы дали Мусе Книгу (Дел), Чтобы они могли идти прямой стезею

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَعَلْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9220'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':451'>بْ</tajweed>نَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> ءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9221'>ةً و</tajweed>َءَاوَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ رَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9222'>بْ</tajweed>وَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9223'>ةٍ ذ</tajweed>َاتِ قَرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9224'>رٍ و</tajweed>َمَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ja'alnabna maryama wa ummahū āyataw wa āwaināhumā ilā rabwatin żāti qarāriw wa ma'īn(in).
verses.translation: Мы сделали знаменьем (ясным) Сына Марйам и мать его И их укрыли на холмистом месте, (Богато орошенном пресною) водой, Где был покой им и надежная защита

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9225'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّسُلُ كُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5307'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيِّبَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9226'>ٱ</tajweed>عْمَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحًا‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ayyuhar-rusulu kulū minaṭ-ṭayyibāti wa'malū ṣāliḥā(n), innī bimā ta'malūna 'alīm(un).
verses.translation: О вы, посланники (Господни)! Вкушайте доброе и делайте благое, - Ведь знаю Я, что делаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َتُكُمْ أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1159'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8854'>ةً و</tajweed>َأَنَا۟ رَبُّكُمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':210'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa inna hāżihī ummatukum ummataw wāḥidataw wa ana rabbukum fattaqūn(i).
verses.translation: Поистине, сей ваш вероустав - Одно-единое установление (Господне), И Я - один-единый ваш Господь, - Так поклоняйтесь только Мне

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَقَطَّع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَمْرَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8517'>ُم ب</tajweed>َيْنَهُمْ زُبُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9227'>رًا‌ۖ ك</tajweed>ُلُّ حِزْ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9228'>بِۭ ب</tajweed>ِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa taqaṭṭa'ū amrahum bainahum zuburā(n), kullu ḥizbim bimā ladaihim fariḥūn(a).
verses.translation: (Не вняли этому завету их потомки) И в это дело разделение внесли на толки меж собой, И обретает радость каждая община Лишь от того, что у нее

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ ح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa żarhum fī gamratihim ḥattā ḥīn(in).
verses.translation: Оставь же их в пучине (их страстей) До времени, (назначенного Нами)

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا نُمِدُّه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9229'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9230'>ِن م</tajweed>َّا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9231'>لٍ و</tajweed>َبَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihī mim māliw wabanīn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель они воображают, Что, дав богатства им и сыновей

verses.text_uthmani: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2181'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَيْر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ‌ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Nusāri'u lahum fil-khairāt(i), bal lā yasy'urūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы поспешим им дать и все другие блага? Да ведь они не понимают (сути)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9232'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9233'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّشْفِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna hum min khasy-yati rabbihim musyfiqūn(a).
verses.translation: Кто, истинно, пред Господом своим В благоговейном страхе пребывает

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9234'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-lażīna hum bi'āyāti rabbihim yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: Кто верует в знамения Господни

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9235'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-lażīna hum birabbihim lā yusyrikūn(a).
verses.translation: И соучастников Ему не придает

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَاتَو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-lażīna yu'tūna mā ātaw wa qulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rāji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Кто с трепетом в душе приносит подать, (Зная о том), что к Богу своему Ему (назначено) вернуться

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ يُسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِعُونَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2181'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَيْر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ulā'ika yusāri'ūna fil-khairāti wa hum lahā sābiqūn(a).
verses.translation: Это они спешат благое совершить, Других опережая в этом

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا‌ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9236'>بٌ ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9237'>نط</tajweed>ِقُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ‌ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lā nukallifu nafsan illā wus'ahā, wa ladainā kitābuy yanṭiqu bil-ḥaqqi wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
verses.translation: И не возложим Мы на душу груз, Что больше, чем она поднимет, - Ведь перед Нами книга (записи их дел), И истину она глаголет: Они обижены не будут

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9238'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9239'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Bal qulūbuhum fī gamratim min hāżā wa lahum a'mālum min dūni żālika hum lahā 'āmilūn(a).
verses.translation: Но их сердца - в пучине (их страстей) об этом; Кроме того, (греховны) их деянья, И будут их они творить

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9240'>ِم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9060'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9241'>جْ</tajweed>ــَٔر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżā akhażnā mutrafīhim bil-'ażābi iżā hum yaj'arūn(a).
verses.translation: Пока Мы тех, Кто (Наших) благ вкусил (сполна), Не поразим (ответной) карой. Гляди, они вопят уже (в мольбе)

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9242'>جْ</tajweed>ــَٔرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9243'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9244'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَا تُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6517'>نص</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā taj'arul-yaum(a), innakum minnā lā tunṣarūn(a).
verses.translation: Сегодня вам вопить (не должно), - Поистине, вам помощи от Нас не получить

verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> كَانَتْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9245'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَعْقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِكُمْ تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9246'>نك</tajweed>ِص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qad kānat āyātī tutlā 'alaikum fa kuntum 'alā a'qābikum tankiṣūn(a).
verses.translation: Мои Знамения читались вам, Вы же от них отворотились

verses.text_uthmani: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> سَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9247'>رًا ت</tajweed>َهْجُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mustakbirīn(a), bihī sāmiran tahjurūn(a).
verses.translation: Возгордившись этим, Болтая попусту о нем во (мраке) ночи

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9248'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْلَ أَمْ ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':466'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9249'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Afalam yaddabbarul-qaula am jā'ahum mā lam ya'ti ābā'ahumul-awwalīn(a).
verses.translation: Что ж им не поразмыслить над (Господним) Словом? Или пришло к ним то, Что прежде к их отцам не приходило

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6721'>نك</tajweed>ِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am lam ya'rifū rasūlahum fahum lahū munkirūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль не признали в нем посланника они И потому его отвергли

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> جِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9250'>ةُۢ‌ۚ ب</tajweed>َلْ ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9251'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am yaqūlūna bihī jinnah(tun), bal jā'ahum bil-ḥaqqi wa akṡaruhum lil-ḥaqqi kārihūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль говорят они: "Безумен он!"? Но нет, он Истину принес им, Хотя она для большинства их ненавистна

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9252'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9253'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقُّ أَهْو<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9254'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2241'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7773'>ن ف</tajweed>ِيهِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ‌ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9255'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9256'>ن ذ</tajweed>ِكْرِه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9257'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّعْرِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lawittaba'al-ḥaqqu ahwā'ahum lafasadatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu wa man fīhinn(a), bal ataināhum biżikrihim fahum 'an żikrihim mu'riḍūn(a).
verses.translation: И если б Истина (Господня) Была созвучна их желаньям, Распался бы (Господень лад) Небес, земли И пребывающего в них (Его веленьем). Мы увещание послали им, (И если заповеди в нем они услышат и исполнят, - Им в нем величие и честь). Они же эту честь отвергли

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ تَسْــَٔلُهُمْ خَرْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9258'>جًا ف</tajweed>َخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9259'>رٌ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َهُوَ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3894'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fa kharāju rabbika khair(un), wa huwa khairur-rāziqīn(a).
verses.translation: Иль ты у них, (о Мухаммад!), награды просишь? Но ведь награда твоего Владыки лучше, - Он - лучший из дарующих наделы

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ لَتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9260'>دْ</tajweed>عُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':726'>طٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innaka latad'ūhum ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
verses.translation: Ты их, поистине, зовешь к пути прямому

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':754'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':447'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9261'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صِّر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>طِ لَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati 'aniṣ-ṣirāṭi lanākibūn(a).
verses.translation: Но те, кто в будущую жизнь не верит, От этого пути уходят

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':2414'>ِم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8832'>ن ض</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9262'>رٍّ ل</tajweed>َّلَجُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى طُغْيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِهِمْ يَعْمَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lau raḥimnāhum wa kasyafnā mā bihim min ḍurril lalajjū fī ṭugyānihim ya'mahūn(a).
verses.translation: И если б Мы помиловали их, Избавив их от их несчастья, То и тогда б они в своем упрямстве Скитались слепо в заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَخَذْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9263'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9060'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابِ فَمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9264'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad akhażnāhum bil-'ażābi famastakānū lirabbihim wa mā yataḍarra'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы поразили карой их - Они же перед Господом своим не укротились, К Нему смиренно не воззвали

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':7208'>ِم ب</tajweed>َا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9265'>بًا ذ</tajweed>َا عَذَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7040'>بٍ ش</tajweed>َدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4051'>بْ</tajweed>لِس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżā fataḥnā 'alaihim bāban żā 'ażābin syadīdin iżā hum fīhi mublisūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж Мы распахнули дверь, Которою на них сошло суровое ненастье, - Гляди! Они уже в отчаянии там

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4114'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4460'>نش</tajweed>َأَ لَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7518'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمْعَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6037'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6037'>بْ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7519'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَفْــِٔدَةَ‌ۚ قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4583'>اً م</tajweed>َّا تَشْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa huwal-lażī yuḥyī wa yumītu wa lahukhtilāful-laili wan-nahār(i), afalā ta'qilūn(a).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто даровал вам зрение, и слух, И сердце, что (способно ощущать и мыслить), - А вы так мало благодарны

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4114'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Bal qālū miṡla mā qālal-awwalūn(a).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто, множа вас, рассеял по земле, К Нему же будете вы собраны опять

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4114'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يُحْى<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9266'>ٱ</tajweed>خْتِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9267'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':834'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَارِ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū a'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa 'iẓāman a'innā lamab'ūṡūn(a).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто жизнь дает и назначает смерть, Владеет сменой ночи днем, - Ужель вам не осмыслить это

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9268'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Laqad wu'idnā naḥnu wa ābā'unā hāżā min qablu in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
verses.translation: Но говорят они все то же, Что говорили предки их

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا تُرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9207'>بًا و</tajweed>َعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7784'>بْ</tajweed>عُوث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū a'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa 'iẓāman a'innā lamab'ūṡūn(a).
verses.translation: И говорят: "Ужель, когда умрем И обратимся в прах и кости, Мы будем истинно воскрешены

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> وُعِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9269'>دْ</tajweed>نَا نَحْنُ وَءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُنَا هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ إِنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>طِيرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3993'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Laqad wu'idnā naḥnu wa ābā'unā hāżā min qablu in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
verses.translation: Сие, поистине, обещано нам было - И нам, и нашим праотцам. Это - всего лишь сказы первых

verses.text_uthmani: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُل لِّمَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9270'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9271'>ن ف</tajweed>ِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul limanil-arḍu wa man fīhā in kuntum ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Кто ведает землей и всем на ней, Если вы знаете (так много)

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Sayaqūlūna lillāh(i), qul afalā tażakkarūn(a).
verses.translation: Аллах! - они ответят (несомненно). Скажи: Неужто вы не образумитесь (и этим)

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6925'>َن ر</tajweed>َّبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6926'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9272'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9273'>بْ</tajweed>عِ وَرَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9274'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5931'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul mar rabbus-samāwātis-sab'i wa rabbul-'arsyil-'aẓīm(i).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Кто Властелин семи небес И Властелин Великого Престола

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

verses.translation: Аллах! - они ответят (несомненно). Скажи: Неужто (и теперь) Не побоитесь вы Его (разгневать)

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul mam biyadihī malakūtu kulli syai'iw wa huwa yujīru wa lā yujāru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: (Теперь) спроси (их): "Чья Рука имеет власть над всем, что суще? Кто (лишь один) способен защитить? Если вы знаете, (ответьте)

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ

verses.translation: Аллах! - они ответят (несомненно). Скажи: Как вы искушены (страстями)

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Bal ataināhum bil-ḥaqqi wa innahum lakāżibūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы Истину послали им, И все же они лгут

verses.text_uthmani: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mattakhażallāhu miw waladiw wa mā kāna ma'ahū min ilāhin iżal lażahaba kullu ilāhim bimā khalaqa wa la'alā ba'ḍuhum 'alā ba'ḍ(in), subḥānallāhi 'ammā yaṣifūn(a).
verses.translation: Ведь никакого сына никогда не брал Себе Аллах - С Ним наравне другого божества не существует! А будь иначе - каждый бог Унес бы то, что сотворил он, И уж тогда б одни из них Чинили б самовластье над другими. СубхАнагу! (Хвала Аллаху!) (Недосягаемо) высок Он над всем тем, Что они тщатся приписать Ему (своим воображеньем)

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa ta'ālā 'ammā yusyrikūn(a).
verses.translation: Ему сокрытое и явное известно, Превыше Он того, Что они ставят в соучастники Ему

verses.text_uthmani: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutaqaribayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutaqaribayn' data-tajweed=':9283'>ل</tajweed> رَّبِّ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تُرِيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مَا يُوعَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qur rabbi immā turiyannī mā yū'adūn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "О Господи! Если Ты явишь мне Все то, что Ты им обещаешь, (увещевая от греха)

verses.text_uthmani: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

verses.translation: Тогда, о Господи, Ты не введи в число неправедных меня

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innā 'alā an nuriyaka mā na'iduhum laqādirūn(a).
verses.translation: Конечно, можем Мы явить тебе, Что Мы им обещаем, (За ослушание грозя суровой карой)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Idfa' bil-latī hiya aḥsanus-sayyi'ah(ta), naḥnu a'lamu bimā yaṣifūn(a).
verses.translation: (Так) отклоняй же зло (их) тем, что лучше, - Известно Нам вернее то, Что им описывает их (воображенье)

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qur rabbi a'ūżu bika min hamazātisy-syayāṭīn(i).
verses.translation: Скажи: "О Господи! Ищу спасенья у Тебя я От искушений дьяволов, (ведомых Сатаной)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa a'ūżu bika rabbi ay yaḥḍurūn(i).
verses.translation: Я у Тебя, о Господи, ищу спасенья, Чтоб не могли они приблизиться ко мне

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
