verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżā jā'a aḥadahumul-mautu qāla rabbirji'ūn(i).
verses.translation: Когда приходит смерть к кому-нибудь из нечестивых, Он говорит: "Господь! Верни мне жизнь

verses.text_uthmani: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَعَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَعْمَلُ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9291'>حًا ف</tajweed>ِيمَا تَرَكْتُ‌ۚ كَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ ق<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِلُهَا‌ۖ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9292'>ِن و</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9293'>ِم ب</tajweed>َرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4606'>بْ</tajweed>عَث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: La'allī a'malu ṣāliḥan fīmā taraktu kallā, innahā kalimatun huwa qā'iluhā, wa miw warā'ihim barzakhun ilā yaumi yub'aṡūn(a).
verses.translation: Чтоб мог творить благое я В том, что оставил (в прошлом) без вниманья". "Не быть тому!" - (ответом будет). Это - лишь слово, что (от страха) молвил он. И сзади них преграда (встанет) До Дня, когда (на Суд) их воскресят

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4185'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّورِ فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9294'>نس</tajweed>َابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9295'>ذٍ و</tajweed>َلَا يَتَس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa iżā nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri falā ansāba bainahum yauma'iżiw wa lā yatasā'alūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда раздастся трубный глас, В тот День родства средь них не будет. Не будут и расспрашивать они (Об участи своей) друг друга

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4591'>ن ث</tajweed>َقُلَتْ مَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِينُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':23'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُفْلِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Faman ṡaqulat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: И те, чья чаша (добрых дел) тяжелой будет, Познают радость и блаженство

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِينُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4592'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':38'>نف</tajweed>ُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa man khaffat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ikal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum fī jahannama khālidūn(a).
verses.translation: А те, чья чаша будет легковесна, Урон тяжелый понесут, - В Аду им вечно пребывать

verses.text_uthmani: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7188'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Talfaḥu wujūhahumun-nāru wa hum fīhā kāliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: Их лица будет жечь огонь, И сведены их губы будут, В оскале зубы обнажая

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9245'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9296'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِهَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam takun āyātī tutlā 'alaikum fa kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
verses.translation: Разве Знамения Мои вам не читались? Разве их ложью не сочли вы

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9297'>قْ</tajweed>وَتُنَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا قَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9298'>مًا ض</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū rabbanā galabat 'alainā syiqwatunā wa kunnā qauman ḍāllīn(a).
verses.translation: О Господи! - они ответят. - Нас одолели наши страсти, И стали мы народом, потерявшим путь

verses.text_uthmani: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَبَّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَخْرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2927'>جْ</tajweed>نَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4860'>دْ</tajweed>نَا فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا ظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Rabbanā akhrijnā minhā fa in 'udnā fa innā ẓālimūn(a).
verses.translation: О, вызволи, Господь, нас из него, И если вновь (ко злу) мы обратимся, Тогда, поистине, мы будем злочестивы

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9299'>ٱ</tajweed>خْسَــُٔو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālakhsa'ū fīhā wa lā tukallimūn(i).
verses.translation: Он скажет (им): "Вы оставайтесь в нем в бесчестии и сраме. Со Мной не смейте говорить

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ فَرِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9300'>قٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1791'>ٱ</tajweed>غْفِرْ لَنَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1721'>ٱ</tajweed>رْحَمْنَا وَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3893'>نت</tajweed>َ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9301'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innahū kāna farīqum min 'ibādī yaqūlūna rabbanā āmannā fagfir lanā warḥamnā wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
verses.translation: Ведь были из служителей Моих такие, Кто говорил: "О Господи! Уверовали мы! Прости нас и простри Свою нам милость, - Ведь самый милосердный Ты

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9302'>نس</tajweed>َوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':151'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9303'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fattakhażtumūhum sikhriyyan ḥattā ansaukum żikrī wa kuntum minhum taḍḥakūn(a).
verses.translation: Вы же издевкам их подвергли - И настолько, Что вы забыли поминать Меня, Когда над ними насмехались

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى جَزَيْتُهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9304'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5510'>ٱ</tajweed>لْف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innī jazaituhumul-yauma bimā ṣabarū, annahum humul-fā'izūn(a).
verses.translation: Сегодня Я их наградил За их терпение и стойкость Тем, что они сегодня торжествуют, Усладе (Рая) предаваясь

verses.text_uthmani: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla kam labiṡtum fil-arḍi 'adada sinīn(a).
verses.translation: Он скажет: "Сколько по числу годов Вы пробыли в земле (до Воскресения на Суд)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9305'>مٍ ف</tajweed>َسْــَٔلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9306'>ٱ</tajweed>لْع<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓدّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū labiṡnā yauman au baḍa yaumin fas'alil-'āddīn(a).
verses.translation: Они ответят: "Пробыли мы там Один лишь день иль часть его - Спроси об этом тех, кто счет ведет (годам)

verses.text_uthmani: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَ إ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7790'>ِن ل</tajweed>َّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9307'>اً‌ۖ ل</tajweed>َّوْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla il labiṡtum illā qalīlal lau annakum kuntum ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Он скажет: "Пробыли вы там совсем немного, - О, если бы вы только знали

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Afa ḥasibtum annamā khalaqnākum 'abaṡaw wa annakum ilainā lā turja'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Так неужели вы считали, Что, забавляясь, создали Мы вас И к Нам не возвратят вас (вновь)

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ta'ālallāhul-malikul-ḥaqq(u), lā ilāha illā huw(a), rabbul-'arsyil-karīm(i).
verses.translation: Велик Аллах, Царь, Сам Истинный, (Как истинно все то, что Им сотворено)! Нет божества, кроме Него - Властителя Престола Чести

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa may yad'u ma'allāhi ilāhan ākhara lā burhāna lahū bih(ī), fa innamā ḥisābuhū 'inda rabbih(ī), innahū lā yufliḥul-kāfirūn(a).
verses.translation: А тот, кто наравне с Аллахом Другого бога призывает, - Нет у того на это основания и власти, Лишь у Него его расчет (за этот грех), - Поистине, неверным не вкусить успеха

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qur rabbigfir warḥam wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи же: "Господи, прости и милуй! Ведь самый милостивый Ты
